data.lyric:
[ti:Double Up (Bonus Track)]
[ar:Nipsey Hussle/Belly/Dom Kennedy]
[al:Victory Lap]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.32]Double Up (Bonus Track) - Nipsey Hussle (尼普西·哈斯勒)/Belly (比利)/Dom Kennedy
[00:02.01]Written by：Dominic Hunn/Ahmad Balshe/Teddy Walton/Axel Morgan/Ermias Asghedom/Alexander Chigbué
[00:04.01]
[00:15.26]Nipsey Hussle/Belly：
[00:15.76]
[00:18.58]Double up
[00:18.99]
[00:19.79]Three or four times I ain't tellin' no lies I just run it up
[00:22.50]
[00:23.05]Never let a hard time humble us
[00:24.55]
[00:26.32]Do-do-double up
[00:27.87]
[00:29.47]I ain't tellin' no lies I just yeah
[00:31.21]
[00:33.87]I ain't tellin' no lies I just
[00:35.60]Five four three two
[00:39.50]
[00:40.06]That's time I got to you
[00:43.82]
[00:44.46]That money my dreams come true
[00:48.28]
[00:48.93]My life in diamonds who knew
[00:52.55]
[00:53.30]Who knew who knew
[01:02.72]
[01:04.91]Nipsey Hussle：
[01:05.48]
[01:12.24]Turned 7 to a 14
[01:13.43]
[01:14.44]14 to a whole thing
[01:15.72]
[01:16.69]Lord knows it's a cold game
[01:17.98]
[01:18.72]Switched up on you hoes mayne
[01:20.10]
[01:20.98]Big body take both lanes
[01:22.22]
[01:23.26]Backseat blowin' propane
[01:24.44]
[01:25.42]All black five gold chains
[01:26.76]Young rich n***a bossed up on his own mayne
[01:28.99]
[01:29.61]My new sh*t sound like it's Soul Train
[01:31.69]Tookie Williams over Coltrane
[01:33.22]Eric B by the rope chain RSC we fo' sho bang
[01:36.49]Tiny locs and they go crazy
[01:38.18]What you know about the dope game
[01:39.85]Was you born in the 80's
[01:41.08]Did your mama smoke c**e
[01:42.04]
[01:42.85]Have you ever seen a whole thang
[01:44.36]What you drove through to the streets
[01:45.57]Cause you grew up on short change
[01:47.15]F**ked up when the dope age
[01:48.86]It remind me when these rappers drop duds and they clothes change
[01:51.69]Had the part with the low fade
[01:53.25]I would stand in front of Nix wit my sack for the whole day
[01:56.11]Drive-by's that was road rage
[01:57.68]Then we park and hop out learn levels to this whole thang
[02:00.44]Old school play the O'Jays
[02:01.74]Tryna make a slow change mama still slavin' for a low wage
[02:04.53]Tryna
[02:04.71]Nipsey Hussle/Belly：
[02:05.05]Double up
[02:05.44]
[02:06.13]Three or four times I ain't tellin' no lies I just run it up
[02:09.05]
[02:09.73]Never let a hard time humble us
[02:11.26]
[02:13.40]Do-do-double up
[02:14.60]
[02:16.18]I ain't tellin' no lies I just yeah
[02:18.02]
[02:20.50]I ain't tellin' no lies I just
[02:22.22]Five four three two
[02:26.04]
[02:26.68]That's time I got to you
[02:30.46]
[02:31.18]That money my dreams come true
[02:34.97]
[02:35.66]My life in diamonds who knew
[02:39.36]
[02:40.09]Who knew who knew
[02:49.95]Belly/Dom Kennedy：
[02:50.66]
[02:57.07]I leave it behind if you let me
[03:00.12]
[03:01.21]I probably got drowned just to hold you down
[03:05.03]
[03:05.59]I'd jump off the ledge if you with me
[03:09.07]
[03:10.21]I'd break you up you just let me down
[03:13.96]
[03:14.62]Let me down
[03:16.26]
[03:20.58]Got my All Money in chain too
[03:21.94]
[03:23.45]Let me down
[03:24.87]
[03:27.68]Dom Kennedy：
[03:28.32]
[03:34.02]It's hard to catch what you can't see
[03:35.50]
[03:36.02]I grew up to be who I wanna be so
[03:38.28]The more n***as talk I'ma shine
[03:39.83]
[03:40.44]Might a been way before its time
[03:42.01]
[03:42.68]Posted wit my back against the wall
[03:44.31]
[03:44.90]Life is a b**ch but she mine
[03:46.53]
[03:47.14]The rag six deuce yeah it's mine
[03:48.70]
[03:49.46]The Westside II yeah it's mine
[03:50.86]
[03:51.49]What you know about
[03:52.33]
[03:53.98]Your poster on the wall like the dealership
[03:55.40]
[03:56.31]Leave her in the bed legs tremblin'
[03:57.66]
[03:58.45]Gettin' banged on for your Pendleton's
[03:59.93]
[04:00.43]What you know about
[04:01.22]
[04:02.69]Your response be the reason you exist
[04:04.21]
[04:04.77]Lucky I ain't get caught up in the twist
[04:06.93]Young n***a blue pager on my hip so
[04:08.77]
[04:09.87]As the champagne spill
[04:10.89]And the car accelerate and the beat gon' cry
[04:13.27]
[04:15.58]I be goin' to the bank at least three four times
[04:17.57]
[04:20.50]Getting handshakes from the branch managers
[04:22.27]
[04:25.03]We keep doing fly sh*t when the cameras cut

[04:27.30]Double up
